---
title: "Confidence intervals"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

tab <- read_csv('../results/chr1_Nelder-Mead_third_run.csv')

mod <- lm(loglik ~ polym(t_A, degree=2, raw=TRUE), data = tab)

x_predict <- seq(min(tab$t_A), max(tab$t_A), length.out = 1000)
y_predict <- predict(mod, newdata = tibble(t_A = x_predict))

summary(mod)

ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(t_A, loglik), data = tab) +
  geom_line(aes(x_predict, y_predict))
  

```
